overview:
Andy Sternberg a co-founder and Chief Digital Strategist at Adler Integrated, a full-service marketing agency specializing in online strategy, branding, event marketing, product rollout, creative campaign consulting and digital engagement services.

An online media strategist, social media consultant, and content specialist with 14+ years experience in corporate and non-profit website management, production, e-commerce, and marketing, Sternberg previously worked for Warner/Chappell Music, as VP of Digital for Live Earth, and as a consultant to companies including Waze, Google, and The X Factor.

He’s also an adjunct instructor in digital journalism at USC’s Annenberg School for Communication and Journalism and has written for LAist, KCET, and serves on the Social Media Week Advisory Board.
